title: Bug 6125: JAR packager reports open files very late
description: When pressing finish, the JAR creation fails with the error message 'JAR creation failed: Unsaved Editors'.
OB: When attempting to create a JAR with unsaved editors, the JAR packager reports the failure and does not allow the user to proceed.
EB: The JAR packager should allow the creation of a JAR with unsaved editors. If there are unsaved changes, a dialog should be presented to allow the user to save them before proceeding with the JAR creation.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a file in the editor and make changes without saving. 2. Open the JAR packager for the associated project. 3. Enter the required fields, such as path, destination, name, and description for the JAR packager. 4. Attempt to create the JAR.
